Portland.First Regiment Armory Annex: The Armory, historically known as the First Regiment Armory Annex, and now called Portland Center Stage at The Armory (named after its current occupant), is a historic building with two theaters inside and is located in Portland, Oregon, United States and is home to the theater company, Portland Center Stage. It was built in 1891 by Multnomah County to house the Oregon National Guard. In 2000, it was added to the National Register of Historic Places.
